content: > **black friday sale 30% discount at checkout until 2nd december** **quick and easy** pattern to knit a snowman ornament to hang on the tree or sit on a shelf with a removable hat and scarf free pattern version on my blog with ads available for both ** straight needles 2 ** seamed down the back and ** knit in the round 3 ** with a circular needle or dpns **premium pattern** for sale on ravelry includes * full pdf pattern with photos 14 pages * short text only pdf pattern for easy printing 4 pages * pattern for both straight + circular needles / dpns * priority pattern support > **get 25% off when you buy any 2 patterns** no coupon needed or > ** join my mailing list 1 for 20% off** all patterns ideal for **using up leftovers** as you only need 30-40m approx of white for the snowman 8-13m approx for the hat & scarf scraps of orange and black for the nose buttons & face while sport or light dk weight yarn is suggested you can use **any yarn** just use a hook a bit smaller than usual * for a slightly bigger chunkier snowman try worsted or aran yarn with 4mm needles * for a smaller more delicate snowman try 4 ply or fingering yarn with 2 5mm needles 1 https //www craftfix com/newsletter 2 https //www craftfix com/snowman-knitting-pattern-straight-needles/ 3 https //www craftfix com/snowman-knitting-pattern-circular/
